last_episode_to_air.name: Haunted Hall and The Night Watch
last_episode_to_air.overview: A peace officer senses a strange and unwelcoming presence at an old union hall. A pianist discovers the past is very present at a historic concert hall.

name: Paranormal Nightshift
overview: By day the workplace is rational and efficient, but at night the same offices, hotels and restaurants become the domain of the supernatural and unexplained. Those who work the graveyard shift reveal their terrifying brushes with the paranormal while on the job.

episodes.name: Night Radio, Lady in Red and Spirit Alley
episodes.overview: A radio host's dream job is threatened by the presence of two terrifying entities; a restaurant owner is confronted by the spirit of a lovelorn woman on Valentine's Day; ghostly footsteps and disembodied voices haunt an empty bowling alley at night.

episodes.name: Family Secret, Third Shift and Night of the Undead
episodes.overview: Sam is an aspiring writer fascinated, some might say obsessed with the Salem witch trials; when a job is available as a night auditor in a Salem hotel steeped in history, Sam leaves Boston and takes the job.

episodes.name: Clown Boy's Revenge, She Follows Me and I.T.
episodes.overview: A phantom clown stalks a custodian down the dark halls of an empty school. A poltergeist terrorizes guests at an upscale spa. An I.T. technician is confronted by a series of paranormal disturbances after he accepts an assignment at a haunted factory.

episodes.name: Sixth Sense, Dead Wood and Beware: I'm Watching
episodes.overview: A single mom draws upon her intuitive abilities to protect her from a paranormal attack at the scene of a suicide. A factory worker is taunted by growls and otherworldly sounds during the graveyard shift. A dorm supervisor is stalked by an unseen entity.

episodes.name: Scent of a Woman, The Resident, and Curtain Call
episodes.overview: A museum director unleashes a trunkful of angry spirits. A care support worker must protect his sleeping charges from a dark paranormal presence. A high school custodian is taunted by a whistling entity while cleaning up a haunted auditorium.

episodes.name: Lady of the House, The Fire Chief, and Caretaker: Take Care
episodes.overview: The dead wife of an elderly patient watches his live-in caretaker's every move. A bartender is served some serious scares while closing up a trendy restaurant. An otherworldly force violently attacks a custodian in an abandoned high school.

episodes.name: The Empress, Trapped and Arcade Apparition
episodes.overview: A dead actress terrorizes the night manager at a historic theater. Vindictive souls prey upon a security guard and his partner inside an old factory. An angry spirit plays deadly games with a frightened teenage girl in an arcade.

episodes.name: Soldier's Story, Dead Pool and Goodbye
episodes.overview: A dead soldier with a wicked temper attacks a military police officer in an abandoned building. The ghost of a drowned girl terrorizes the staff at a hotel. A restaurant manager comes face-to-face with a horrifying apparition.

episodes.name: Do Not Disturb and Hotel Hauntings
episodes.overview: Holiday joy turns into terror for the owner of a historic inn and her assistant during a snowstorm. A young man is a skeptic until he works the night shift at a hotel rumored to be haunted by dark and powerful spirits.

episodes.name: It Crawls, Demons walk with us, and Tortured Spirits
episodes.overview: A terrifying apparition stalks the dark halls of a group home. A security guard is confronted by the spirit of a long-dead custodian, an ancient warrior, and shadow figures in an office building. A man is overcome by an oppressive force while cleaning up the scene of a suicide.

episodes.name: Night at the Museum and Friday Night Frights
episodes.overview: A security guard takes matters into his own hands after a terrifying night in a haunted museum. A young woman encounters a pair of demonic doppelgangers while working the overnight shift at a fast food restaurant.

episodes.name: Cries in the Dark, Late Night on Haunted Land and Ghost Bait
episodes.overview: A security guard hears ghostly wails at a secluded campground. A gas station clerk is besieged by inexplicable terror while working the night shift. A mysterious intruder leaves an overnight manager on edge at a fishing resort.

episodes.name: Haunted Hall and The Night Watch
episodes.overview: A peace officer senses a strange and unwelcoming presence at an old union hall. A pianist discovers the past is very present at a historic concert hall.
